content.title: Environmental
content.body: Taking care of our ecosystems and our environment alive and clean.

content.title: Social & Economic
content.body: Keeping our society healthy, maintaining our incomes, and staying ahead of technology.

content.title: Balancing All Three
content.body: The key to a sustainable society is balancing environment health, social health, and economic health to maintain resources for future generations.

HowCanIBeMoreSustainable.title: How Can I Be More Sustainable?

content.title: Explore this website
content.body: This website is full of rich information about sustainability that you can learn!

content.title: Be aware of your impact
content.body: Use this comprehensive guide to measure your ecological footprint!
